channel.title: Org Mode on
channel.description: Recent content in Org Mode on

item.title: Keep Table of Contents Up to Date in Org Mode
item.description: It's easy to export an org document to html and get a table of contents, but sometimes it's nice to have a table of contents inside of an org-mode file. The =toc-org= package makes this automatic. Simply tag a headline with :TOC: and the headline will auto fill an index with all following headlines.

item.title: How I org with spacemacs
item.description: This weekend Neil Watson asked if I could share how I use org-mode with Spacemacs. @cmdln_ Care to share with an Emacs illiterate how you got Spacemacs and Org-mode to work together? -- @neil_h_watson First of all, I spend most of my time in a terminal, and vim is ingrained in my muscle memory any time I need to edit a file. While Vim is my goto editor I consider myself just a novice Vim user.
